definition: any of a class of solid or semisolid viscous substances obtained either as exudations from certain plants or prepared by polymerization of simple molecules, rub rosin onto
details:
noun
- any of a class of solid or semisolid viscous substances obtained either as exudations from certain plants or prepared by polymerization of simple molecules
= synonyms: resin
verb
- rub rosin onto
= example: rub rosin onto
